desc:
50% boost to Spark damage & raises normal hit amount
Guild Raid: 15% Atk, Def, Rec boost

dictionary.lore: Named after the Vardket god of righteous battles and retreats, this phylactery was meant to be mounted onto a warrior's chest after their Trial of Acceptance. It increases the user's physical strength by purifying their life force and filling it with courage. The words "The Dust-Yellow King shall triumph no more." can be found along its rim. It empowers its user in Guild Raids, although some have claimed to dream afterward of battles against a warrior clothed in gold.

name: Jeu'vrr's Heart
